      • com.wicare.wistorm.ui.slidingmuen.SlidingMenu

extends RelativeLayout

    • 字段详细资料

      • SLIDING_WINDOW

        public static final int SLIDING_WINDOW
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SLIDING_CONTENT

        public static final int SLIDING_CONTENT
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • TOUCHMODE_MARGIN

        public static final int TOUCHMODE_MARGIN
        Constant value for use with setTouchModeAbove(). Allows the SlidingMenu to be opened with a swipe gesture on the screen's margin
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • TOUCHMODE_FULLSCREEN

        public static final int TOUCHMODE_FULLSCREEN
        Constant value for use with setTouchModeAbove(). Allows the SlidingMenu to be opened with a swipe gesture anywhere on the screen
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • TOUCHMODE_NONE

        public static final int TOUCHMODE_NONE
        Constant value for use with setTouchModeAbove(). Denies the SlidingMenu to be opened with a swipe gesture
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • LEFT

        public static final int LEFT
        Constant value for use with setMode(). Puts the menu to the left of the content.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • RIGHT

        public static final int RIGHT
        Constant value for use with setMode(). Puts the menu to the right of the content.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • LEFT_RIGHT

        public static final int LEFT_RIGHT
        Constant value for use with setMode(). Puts menus to the left and right of the content.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • attachToActivity

        public void attachToActivity(Activity activity,
                             int slideStyle)
        Attaches the SlidingMenu to an entire Activity
        参数:
        activity - the Activity
        slideStyle - either SLIDING_CONTENT or SLIDING_WINDOW

      • attachToActivity

        public void attachToActivity(Activity activity,
                             int slideStyle,
                             boolean actionbarOverlay)
        Attaches the SlidingMenu to an entire Activity
        参数:
        activity - the Activity
        slideStyle - either SLIDING_CONTENT or SLIDING_WINDOW
        actionbarOverlay - whether or not the ActionBar is overlaid

      • setContent

        public void setContent(int res)
        Set the above view content from a layout resource. The resource will be inflated, adding all top-level views to the above view.
        参数:
        res - the new content

      • setContent

        public void setContent(View view)
        Set the above view content to the given View.
        参数:
        view - The desired content to display.

        public void setBackgroundImage(int resid)
        设置背景图片
        参数:
        resid -

      • getContent

        public View getContent()
        Retrieves the current content.
        返回:
        the current content

      • setMenu

        public void setMenu(int res)
        Set the behind view (menu) content from a layout resource. The resource will be inflated, adding all top-level views to the behind view.
        参数:
        res - the new content

      • setMenu

        public void setMenu(View v)
        Set the behind view (menu) content to the given View.
        参数:
        view - The desired content to display.

      • getMenu

        public View getMenu()
        Retrieves the main menu.
        返回:
        the main menu

      • setSecondaryMenu

        public void setSecondaryMenu(int res)
        Set the secondary behind view (right menu) content from a layout resource. The resource will be inflated, adding all top-level views to the behind view.
        参数:
        res - the new content

      • setSecondaryMenu

        public void setSecondaryMenu(View v)
        Set the secondary behind view (right menu) content to the given View.
        参数:
        view - The desired content to display.

      • getSecondaryMenu

        public View getSecondaryMenu()
        Retrieves the current secondary menu (right).
        返回:
        the current menu

      • setSlidingEnabled

        public void setSlidingEnabled(boolean b)
        Sets the sliding enabled.
        参数:
        b - true to enable sliding, false to disable it.

      • isSlidingEnabled

        public boolean isSlidingEnabled()
        Checks if is sliding enabled.
        返回:
        true, if is sliding enabled

      • setMode

        public void setMode(int mode)
        Sets which side the SlidingMenu should appear on.
        参数:
        mode - must be either SlidingMenu.LEFT or SlidingMenu.RIGHT

      • getMode

        public int getMode()
        Returns the current side that the SlidingMenu is on.
        返回:
        the current mode, either SlidingMenu.LEFT or SlidingMenu.RIGHT

      • setStatic

        public void setStatic(boolean b)
        Sets whether or not the SlidingMenu is in static mode (i.e. nothing is moving and everything is showing)
        参数:
        b - true to set static mode, false to disable static mode.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Opens the menu and shows the menu view.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu(boolean animate)
        Opens the menu and shows the menu view.
        参数:
        animate - true to animate the transition, false to ignore animation

      • showSecondaryMenu

        public void showSecondaryMenu()
        Opens the menu and shows the secondary menu view. Will default to the regular menu if there is only one.

      • showSecondaryMenu

        public void showSecondaryMenu(boolean animate)
        Opens the menu and shows the secondary (right) menu view. Will default to the regular menu if there is only one.
        参数:
        animate - true to animate the transition, false to ignore animation

      • showContent

        public void showContent()
        Closes the menu and shows the above view.

      • showContent

        public void showContent(boolean animate)
        Closes the menu and shows the above view.
        参数:
        animate - true to animate the transition, false to ignore animation

      • toggle

        public void toggle()
        Toggle the SlidingMenu. If it is open, it will be closed, and vice versa.

      • toggle

        public void toggle(boolean animate)
        Toggle the SlidingMenu. If it is open, it will be closed, and vice versa.
        参数:
        animate - true to animate the transition, false to ignore animation

      • isMenuShowing

        public boolean isMenuShowing()
        Checks if is the behind view showing.
        返回:
        Whether or not the behind view is showing

      • isSecondaryMenuShowing

        public boolean isSecondaryMenuShowing()
        Checks if is the behind view showing.
        返回:
        Whether or not the behind view is showing

      • getBehindOffset

        public int getBehindOffset()
        Gets the behind offset.
        返回:
        The margin on the right of the screen that the behind view scrolls to

      • setBehindOffset

        public void setBehindOffset(int i)
        Sets the behind offset.
        参数:
        i - The margin, in pixels, on the right of the screen that the behind view scrolls to.

      • setBehindOffsetRes

        public void setBehindOffsetRes(int resID)
        Sets the behind offset.
        参数:
        resID - The dimension resource id to be set as the behind offset. The menu, when open, will leave this width margin on the right of the screen.

      • setAboveOffset

        public void setAboveOffset(int i)
        Sets the above offset.
        参数:
        i - the new above offset, in pixels

      • setAboveOffsetRes

        public void setAboveOffsetRes(int resID)
        Sets the above offset.
        参数:
        resID - The dimension resource id to be set as the above offset.

      • setBehindWidth

        public void setBehindWidth(int i)
        Sets the behind width.
        参数:
        i - The width the Sliding Menu will open to, in pixels

      • setBehindWidthRes

        public void setBehindWidthRes(int res)
        Sets the behind width.
        参数:
        res - The dimension resource id to be set as the behind width offset. The menu, when open, will open this wide.

      • getBehindScrollScale

        public float getBehindScrollScale()
        Gets the behind scroll scale.
        返回:
        The scale of the parallax scroll

      • getTouchmodeMarginThreshold

        public int getTouchmodeMarginThreshold()
        Gets the touch mode margin threshold
        返回:
        the touch mode margin threshold

      • setTouchmodeMarginThreshold

        public void setTouchmodeMarginThreshold(int touchmodeMarginThreshold)
        Set the touch mode margin threshold
        参数:
        touchmodeMarginThreshold -

      • setBehindScrollScale

        public void setBehindScrollScale(float f)
        Sets the behind scroll scale.
        参数:
        f - The scale of the parallax scroll (i.e. 1.0f scrolls 1 pixel for every 1 pixel that the above view scrolls and 0.0f scrolls 0 pixels)

      • setBehindCanvasTransformer

        public void setBehindCanvasTransformer(SlidingMenu.CanvasTransformer t)
        Sets the behind canvas transformer.
        参数:
        t - the new behind canvas transformer

      • setAboveCanvasTransformer

        public void setAboveCanvasTransformer(SlidingMenu.CanvasTransformer t)
        Sets the above canvas transformer.
        参数:
        t - the new above canvas transformer

      • getTouchModeAbove

        public int getTouchModeAbove()
        Gets the touch mode above.
        返回:
        the touch mode above

      • setTouchModeAbove

        public void setTouchModeAbove(int i)
        Controls whether the SlidingMenu can be opened with a swipe gesture. Options are TOUCHMODE_MARGIN, TOUCHMODE_FULLSCREEN, or TOUCHMODE_NONE
        参数:
        i - the new touch mode

      • setTouchModeBehind

        public void setTouchModeBehind(int i)
        Controls whether the SlidingMenu can be opened with a swipe gesture. Options are TOUCHMODE_MARGIN, TOUCHMODE_FULLSCREEN, or TOUCHMODE_NONE
        参数:
        i - the new touch mode

        public void setShadowWidth(int pixels)
        Sets the shadow width.

      • setFadeEnabled

        public void setFadeEnabled(boolean b)
        Enables or disables the SlidingMenu's fade in and out
        参数:
        b - true to enable fade, false to disable it

      • setFadeDegree

        public void setFadeDegree(float f)
        Sets how much the SlidingMenu fades in and out. Fade must be enabled, see setFadeEnabled(boolean)
        参数:
        f - the new fade degree, between 0.0f and 1.0f

      • setSelectorEnabled

        public void setSelectorEnabled(boolean b)
        Enables or disables whether the selector is drawn
        参数:
        b - true to draw the selector, false to not draw the selector

      • setSelectedView

        public void setSelectedView(View v)
        Sets the selected view. The selector will be drawn here
        参数:
        v - the new selected view

      • setSelectorDrawable

        public void setSelectorDrawable(int res)
        Sets the selector drawable.
        参数:
        res - a resource ID for the selector drawable

        public void setSelectorBitmap(Bitmap b)
        Sets the selector drawable.
        参数:
        b - the new selector bitmap

      • addIgnoredView

        public void addIgnoredView(View v)
        Add a View ignored by the Touch Down event when mode is Fullscreen
        参数:
        v - a view to be ignored

      • removeIgnoredView

        public void removeIgnoredView(View v)
        Remove a View ignored by the Touch Down event when mode is Fullscreen
        参数:
        v - a view not wanted to be ignored anymore

      • clearIgnoredViews

        public void clearIgnoredViews()
        Clear the list of Views ignored by the Touch Down event when mode is Fullscreen

      • setOnOpenListener

        public void setOnOpenListener(SlidingMenu.OnOpenListener listener)
        Sets the OnOpenListener. OnOpenListener.onOpen() will be called when the SlidingMenu is opened
        参数:
        listener - the new OnOpenListener

      • setSecondaryOnOpenListner

        public void setSecondaryOnOpenListner(SlidingMenu.OnOpenListener listener)
        Sets the OnOpenListner for secondary menu OnOpenListener.onOpen() will be called when the secondary SlidingMenu is opened
        参数:
        listener - the new OnOpenListener

      • setOnCloseListener

        public void setOnCloseListener(SlidingMenu.OnCloseListener listener)
        Sets the OnCloseListener. OnCloseListener.onClose() will be called when any one of the SlidingMenu is closed
        参数:
        listener - the new setOnCloseListener

      • setOnOpenedListener

        public void setOnOpenedListener(SlidingMenu.OnOpenedListener listener)
        Sets the OnOpenedListener. OnOpenedListener.onOpened() will be called after the SlidingMenu is opened
        参数:
        listener - the new OnOpenedListener

      • setOnClosedListener

        public void setOnClosedListener(SlidingMenu.OnClosedListener listener)
        Sets the OnClosedListener. OnClosedListener.onClosed() will be called after the SlidingMenu is closed
        参数:
        listener - the new OnClosedListener
